metadata.name: Hitchhiker of Star_ SSR #1
metadata.description: Hitchhiker of Star, or H.O.S, is a set of characters whose designs are inspired by the popular animation images, the minions. It is the first NFT collection issued on HyperNFT platform in the form of mystery boxes. As entrance ticket into the HyperNation-a metaverse financial platform-an H.O.S NFT generates corresponded Token ID as the only identity in NFT Domain of the platform, allowing its holder to complete package purchases, collect releases, develop market teams and gain rewards with sustainable benefits.This H.O.S NFT Mystery Box issuing includes Platinum Box (superior box), Purple Box (premium box) and Yellow Box (standard box), wrapped respectively with NFTs in 3D and 2D versions. Their rarity ranks N, R, SR and SSR, triggering different levels of rights and functions in HyperNation.With its super popularity and high rewards, holders of H.O.S are guaranteed a sustainable future and constant fun in the long run.
